snippet.title: Streets of Rogue 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative
snippet.description:
Learn more about Streets of Rogue 2: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165810/Streets_of_Rogue_2/

Streets of Rogue 2 has premiered an over-the-top Gameplay Trailer showcasing key mechanics of the upcoming sandbox RPG. From dozens of quirky playable classes, crafting, and a huge procedurally-generated open world to supercars, farming, and unique items like a rat-summoning ocarina and an alien shrink ray — Streets of Rogue 2 promises to elevate everything that made the original game a cult roguelite hit. Streets of Rogue 2 will be released into Steam Early Access later this year.

Follow news and updates on The Triple-i Initiative:
Website: https://iii-initiative.com
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/triple-i-initiative 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/iii_initiative 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG-chdE8x9az-eyO0Gflr6Q 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iii_initiative 

About The Triple-i Initiative:

The Triple-i Initiative is a new collaborative effort to highlight fan-favorite games and hype up established indie classics as well as new IPs. The Initiative is backed by strong independent studios such as Evil Empire, Red Hook, Mega Crit Games, Poncle, Stunlock Studios, Thunder Lotus, Re- Logic, Ghostship Games, Extremely OK Games, Heart Machine and more.
